boat.name: Susan J
boat.full_description:
Susan J's first owners took her through the French canals and cruised the Mediterranean. She had a complete refit during 2001 - 2002 at Sandbanks Yacht Company, Poole, including a new bowsprit, rigging, teakwork and electrics.

With her second owners, the Shaws, she sailed to the Channel Islands, Normandy and Brittany coasts, west coast of England and the Scilly Islands from her base in the Solent. In 2003 she sailed around Britain and in 2013 took part in the OGA Jubilee celebrations in Cowes. She attended the 10th Anniversary Tour with the Dutch OGA in 2014.

Changing hands in 2017, her new owners took her on the OGA Sou' by Sou'West Cruise when she reached the Scilly Islands. She attended the OGA 55 celebrations in Cowes and in 2019 cruised to North Brittany.
boat.construction_details: GRP hull moulded by Gaffers and Luggers 1991, fit out and rig by Traditional Yacht Services 1992.

Susan J is a Heard 28, built in 1991 by Gaffers and Luggers and has cruised extensively.

for_sales.sales_text:
A Heard 28 Falmouth Workboat hull, built by Gaffers and Luggers in 1991, and fitted out by Traditional Yacht Services in 1992 on the Isle of Wight. One previous owner, sleeps five. Sale includes extensive list of Raymarine instruments chartplotter/radar. VHF Navtex and more. Well equipped for cruising.

GRP hull, ply covered deck, teak superstructure with painted Brazilian mahoganhy coachouse sides. Perkins Parama 30hp three cylinder diesel engine, fresh water cooled. LOD 28", LWL 26.6", Draft 5.3", LOA 41", Beam 9.9"

We have had "Susan J" since October 1999. We have found her to be a very fast and stable cruising boat. Whether sailing with two or four people she has proved to be comfortable for a boat only 28" in length. Cruising ground includes sailing round Britain, frequent cruises to France and Holland. "Susan J" is a one off, built to a high standard on the Heard 28 hull. She is in very good order having had a major refit in 2002 and well maintained by professionals on an annual basis ever since. The boat has been wintered ashore every year. The professionally finished interior certainly makes this boat top of the list if you are looking for a modern boat with traditional styling and rig.

Contact Dan Shaw for full specification: an exceptional boat with great interior and extensive list of extras.
